Text: Thank you so much.  You are the only one uploading Oprah.  I live in Central America and have no television whatsoever.  I am lucky to have internet.  You are my hero.  :)
I'm glad you are enjoying them!  I have a few more to upload... I love Oprah too... I miss her daily shows so much!  These interviews are top-notch... I think she is just brilliant!
